# Aengus Bridgman — Full Profile

> Assistant Professor (Research), Max Bell School of Public Policy, McGill University
> Montreal, Quebec, Canada

## About

Aengus Bridgman is a political scientist studying political behaviour and communication in Canada and other mature democracies. He works with survey, census, and social/traditional media data, with expertise in data science, machine learning, natural language processing, and computational social science.

He directs the Media Ecosystem Observatory (MEO), Canada's leading research centre monitoring digital information ecosystems during elections and public health crises. MEO tracks social media content across platforms (X/Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, TikTok, Telegram, Bluesky) to study misinformation, platform governance, and information quality.

## Research Areas

- Misinformation and disinformation
- Elections and voting behaviour
- Social media and digital platforms
- AI and technology policy
- Foreign interference
- Canadian politics
- COVID-19 and public health communication
- Democracy and political participation
